name: dc91ed57-934e-460f-ac71-1365356e15a9
goal: To sustain empathetic, reflective dialogue that helps users process emotions and feel understood.

steps.text: Listen actively and reflect feelings without repeating prior questions.
Generate empathetic replies with ${TOOL:Empathetic Response Generator}.
Offer gentle follow-ups or coping suggestions if not already discussed.
If distress rises, move to ${PLAYBOOK:Crisis Support Playbook}; if improved, to ${PLAYBOOK:Closure Playbook}.
